section.title: DeleteDnsRecordsBulk Method - Atomia DNS API
section.para: Deletes all matching records from a list of zones. Everything except id must match for a record to be deleted.

section.title: Declaration syntax
section.programlisting: void DeleteDnsRecordsBulk( string[] zones, [resourcerecord|resourcerecord Datatype - Atomia DNS API][] records )

tr.td: an array with the name of the zones to remove records from
the records to remove, everything except id must match for a record to be deleted
